title: [Mistydeep, Ravelin]
description: Smoke from nearby homes drifts out over the water and flows along with the current.  A half-finished canoe, hewn from a felled birch, rests on wooden trestles near the west bank.  Another watercraft, bowl-shaped and fashioned from tightly woven rushes, sits nearby with a crudely-shaped oar leaning against its rim.  The slow-moving water creates little sound, allowing bird songs and various animal skitterings to be easily heard.
paths: Obvious paths: southeast, south, west, northwest, down
room.location: the northern reaches of the Mistydeep River
